self_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon believes he will cause Oleg Petrenko a lot of problems and expects to have better control by the end of the match. He thinks Petrenko's best performances will come early, and Devon will drain his strength over time.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Devon's style of taking the hand and controlling the match will be problematic for Petrenko.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon thinks Michael Todd has a better shot at beating Genadi this time, noting Genadi might not have fully recovered from his injury.
